Key Match Events: Draymond Green's foul on Zach Edey was upgraded to Flagrant 1 after the game, leading to his ejection.
Post-Match Reflections: Grizzlies coach Taylor Jenkins expressed confusion over the foul not being reviewed and praised Zach Edey's performance.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Draymond Green reached four technical fouls in the season, tying him with Jayson Tatum and Dillon Brooks.
